title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Roy Demeo Cut Nino Gaggi Open & Dug The Bullet Out"
description: A hit was put out on Jimmy The Clam and was assigned to Roy Demeo and Nino Gaggi. After the hit, the cops get involved and one of them catches Nino with a bullet, luckily Roy Demeo invents an elaborate  plan to save them from prison.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: A hit was put out on Jimmy The Clam and was assigned to Roy Demeo and Nino Gaggi. After the hit, the cops get involved and one of them catches Nino with a bullet, luckily Roy Demeo invents an elaborate  plan to save them from prison.
